ConstructGraph: Built event graph linking node aiops-k8s-04 to high-latency traces (5514.16ms) and affected services (emailservice, checkoutservice) running on this node.
GenerateHypotheses: Proposed infrastructure resource contention hypothesis due to correlated node CPU spikes and service performance degradation.
RunConsensus: Used decentralized voting to synthesize specialist inputs, ranking aiops-k8s-04 (score 4.379) as top infrastructure candidate.

metrics:node:node_cpu_usage_rate spike 67.43 avg 49.38; metrics:node:node_disk_written_bytes_total spike 160972.80 avg 87778.00; metrics:node:node_filesystem_free_bytes spike 16447238144.00 avg 16435001265.23

reason: Shipping service shows extreme latency spikes (59977.54ms) and high error ratios (63.16 spike) causing checkout failures with 'shipping quote failure' errors, making it the primary bottleneck. Evidence: metrics:service:client_error, metrics:service:client_error_ratio, checkoutservice->shippingservice

reasoning_trace.observation: ScopeTelemetry: Focused on incident window 2025-06-07T22:10:12Z to 22:21:12Z, filtering telemetry to relevant services and nodes showing anomalies.
SurfaceSignals: Identified shippingservice with highest service score (15.004), extreme latency spikes (59977.54ms), and error ratio spikes (63.16).
ConstructGraph: Built causal chain: frontend → checkoutservice → shippingservice, with shippingservice showing critical latency degradation and error propagation.
GenerateHypotheses: Proposed shippingservice as root cause due to its severe performance degradation affecting dependent services and user transactions.
RunConsensus: Used decentralized voting to synthesize agent hypotheses, confirming shippingservice as top candidate with highest confidence from TraceSpecialist (7.50).

reasoning_trace.observation: ScopeTelemetry: Focused on time window 2025-06-07T23:10:13Z to 2025-06-07T23:29:13Z and identified node-level KPI anomalies across six nodes.
SurfaceSignals: Detected widespread node_cpu_usage_rate spikes, with aiops-k8s-01 showing the highest spike (68.18) and significant disk activity.
ConstructGraph: Built event graph linking node aiops-k8s-01 to high-latency traces (400.31ms) and multiple affected services (checkoutservice, frontend, recommendationservice).
GenerateHypotheses: Formed hypothesis that node resource contention on aiops-k8s-01 is causing cascading service performance degradation.
RunConsensus: Applied decentralized voting per mABC paper, with node candidates scoring high (aiops-k8s-01: 5.943) and infrastructure anomalies being dominant.
